about_the_game:
Demo Content:

The demo version will include:

  • 5 levels (the full - version contains 9 levels)

  • 1 main hero (the full - version will include multiple main heroes)

  • Cards from 2 races (the full - version will include cards from multiple races)

  • More than 50 cards! (the full - version will include more than 200 cards)

Game Features:

Help our banshee navigate through the perilous Fairy Land by collecting a wide variety of cards!

  • The main hero comes with an exclusive clothing - destruction system!

  • A sexy and powerful banshee awaits you to defeat!

  • Diverse fairy summoning: Summon dozens of fairies with different abilities and create your own powerful combinations!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that may not be suitable for all ages or may not be appropriate to access during working hours: Some nudity or pornographic content.

  • Cards from 2 races (the full - version will include cards from multiple races)

name: Cult Land Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 1060
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is the demo version of the game "Cult Land", which accounts for approximately 20% of the full - version's size. The main differences lie in aspects such as the number of levels, the number of races, and the number of protagonists.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal
